item.title: BC-99 South - Exit 37
item.description: BC-99 south at Exit 37 - BC-91 South/New Westminster/North Delta/Surrey.

item.title: BC-99 South - Exit 39A
item.description: BC-99 south at Exit 39A - Shell Road. Continue south on BC-99 for BC-91, USA Border, and Ferry to Victoria and Nanaimo.

item.title: BC-99 South - Exits 39B and 39A
item.description: BC-99 at Exit 39B - Number 4 Road. Approaching Exit 39A - Shell Road. Continue south on BC-99 for BC-91, USA Border, and Ferry to Victoria and Nanaimo.

item.title: BC-99 South - Border Crossing Times
item.description: Vancouver area border crossing times into the USA on BC-99 south. Border crossing times via Peace Arch (BC-99), Pacific X-ING (BC-15), Aldergrove (BC-13), and Sumas (BC-11).

item.title: Sea Island Way at BC-99
item.description: Sea Island Way east at BC-99. Merge right for BC-99 South/To BC-91/New Westminster/Delta/Surrey. Use BC-99 north for Vancouver.

item.title: Sea Island Way East Approaching BC-99
item.description: Sea Island Way East Approaching BC-99 in Richmond. Speed Limit 60 km/h.

item.title: Sea Island Way Approaching BC-99
item.description: Sea Island Way approaching BC-99. Use BC-99 south for TC-1 East to Hope.

item.title: Sea Island Way at Number 3 Road
item.description: Sea Island Way at Number 3 Road. Continue east on Sea Island Way for BC-99 North/Vancouver and BC-99 South/To BC-91/New Westminster/Delta/Surrey.

item.title: Miller Road West at Sea Island Way Ramps
item.description: Miller Road West at Sea Island Way onramp. Turn right onto Sea Island Way for Ferries, Seattle via BC-99, and No. 3 Road.

item.title: BC-99 North - Destinations
item.description: Destinations on BC-99 North (Oak St.). Use BC-99 north for (Vancouver) City Center, Nanaimo and Gibbons Ferry, and Whistler.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exits 41A and 41B
item.description: BC-99 north at Exit 41A - Marine Drive East. Approaching Exit 41B - Marine Drive West. The BC-99 freeway ends after this interchange and becomes a surface street.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exits 41A-B
item.description: BC-99 north approaching Exit 41A - Marine Drive East and Exit 41B - Marine Drive West.

item.title: BC-99 North - Entering Vancouver
item.description: Entering city of Vancouver on BC-99 north. Vancouver is the largest city in the province of British Columbia and the 8th biggest city in Canada.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 39
item.description: BC-99 north approaching Exit 39 - Bridgeport Road/Vancouver - YVR International. Continue north on BC-99 for Vancouver.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exits 36 and 37
item.description: BC-99 north at Exit 36 - Westminster Highway. Approaching Exit 37 - BC-91/North Delta/Surrey. Continue north on BC-99 for Vancouver and Vancouver International Airport.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exits 36 and 37
item.description: BC-99 approaching Exit 36 - Westminster Highway. Approaching Exit 37 - BC-91/North Delta/Surrey. Continue north on BC-99 for Vancouver and Vancouver International Airport (YVR).

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 36
item.description: BC-99 north approaching Exit 36 - Westminster Highway.

item.title: BC-99 North - Next 3 Exits
item.description: Next 3 exits on BC-99 north in Richmond: Westminster Highway, Hwy BC-91, and Bridgeport Road.

item.title: BC-99 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on BC-99 north. Distance to (Vancouver International) Airport, Vancouver, and Surrey (via BC-91).

item.description: BC-99 at Exit 32 - Steveston Highway.

item.title: BC-99 North - Vancouver and Airport
item.description: Variable message sign on BC-99 North approaching the George Massey Tunnel. Use BC-99 north for Vancouver and Airport

item.title: BC-99 - Exit 26
item.description: BC-99 north at Exit 26 - BC-17 West/Tsawwassen/BC-17A/Ladner River Road. Continue north on BC-99 for Richmond and Vancouver. Use BC-17 West for the Tsawwassen Ferry Terminals.

item.title: BC-99 North - Vancouver and Richmond
item.description: Alternate routes to Vancouver and Richmond on BC-99 north. Vancouver and Richmond traffic can use either BC-99 or BC-91.

item.description: Entering Surrey on BC-99 North. Use next 3 exits on BC-99 for Surrey.

item.description: BC-99 North at US/Canada border. Think metric - 30 km/h was 20 MPH. A smaller sign below that instructs Nexus traffic to keep right.
